product.name: iPhone 16
product.description: Experience the future of mobile technology with the all-new iPhone 16. Designed for power, performance, and style, this stunning Blue variant blends sleek aesthetics with cutting-edge innovation. With an advanced chipset, enhanced camera system, and immersive display, the iPhone 16 ensures smooth multitasking, vibrant visuals, and crystal-clear photos and videos. Whether you're capturing memories or managing your day-to-day tasks, the iPhone 16 delivers it all with elegance and speed.

product.name: Samsung Galaxy S24
product.description: Introducing the Samsung Galaxy S24 – a perfect fusion of performance and elegance. Wrapped in a sleek Phantom Black finish, this premium smartphone features a lightning-fast processor, pro-grade camera setup, and a brilliant AMOLED display. Whether you're gaming, streaming, or snapping high-resolution photos, the Galaxy S24 delivers an exceptional experience that keeps you ahead of the curve.

product.name: Dell XPS 15
product.description: Power meets precision with the Dell XPS 15, crafted for creators, professionals, and tech enthusiasts. Housed in a sleek Platinum Silver chassis, this laptop boasts a stunning 15.6-inch InfinityEdge display, powerful Intel Core processor, and ultra-fast SSD storage. Whether you're editing 4K videos or multitasking across intensive applications, the XPS 15 delivers seamless performance with style.

product.name: Apple iPad Air (5th Gen)
product.description: Experience power in a portable form with the Apple iPad Air (5th Gen). Featuring the blazing-fast M1 chip, a vibrant Liquid Retina display, and seamless Apple Pencil compatibility, it's the perfect device for both creativity and productivity on the go.

product.name: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6
product.description: Stay connected and track your health with the stylish Samsung Galaxy Watch 6. Equipped with advanced fitness tracking, heart monitoring, and a vibrant AMOLED display, this Graphite beauty keeps you informed and on the move all day long.

product.name: Sony WH-1000XM5
product.description: Immerse yourself in superior sound with the Sony WH-1000XM5 noise-canceling headphones. Featuring crystal-clear audio, adaptive sound control, and long-lasting battery life, these sleek Midnight Black headphones are perfect for travel, work, or pure relaxation.

product.name: LG 55" OLED evo TV
product.description: Enjoy a cinematic experience with LG’s 55-inch OLED evo TV, delivering deep blacks, vibrant colors, and Dolby Atmos sound.

product.name: Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II
product.description: Portable, powerful, and immersive – Bose SoundLink Revolve+ II delivers 360° sound with water-resistance and 17-hour battery life.

product.name: OnePlus Pad
product.description: The OnePlus Pad offers high-speed performance with an 11.6-inch display and sleek Halo Green finish for work and play.

product.name: Mi Air Purifier 4
product.description: Keep your home fresh and clean with Mi Air Purifier 4, featuring smart sensors and high-efficiency particle filtration.

product.name: Fitbit Charge 6
product.description: Your all-day fitness companion, Fitbit Charge 6 offers GPS, heart rate tracking, and stress management features in a Coral band.

product.name: Logitech MX Master 3S
product.description: Elevate productivity with Logitech MX Master 3S – a precision wireless mouse with MagSpeed scrolling and ergonomic design.

product.name: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen)
product.description: Smart speaker with Alexa – play music, control smart devices, and get information instantly with Echo Dot (5th Gen).

product.name: KitchenAid Artisan Mixer
product.description: Bake like a pro with the KitchenAid Artisan stand mixer. A powerful motor and sleek Empire Red finish add charm to any kitchen.

product.name: ASUS ROG Strix G17
product.description: Unleash your gaming potential with the ASUS ROG Strix G17 featuring Ryzen 9 CPU, RTX graphics, and high-refresh display.

product.name: Nikon Z30 Vlogger Kit
product.description: A compact mirrorless camera designed for creators – the Nikon Z30 vlogger kit includes tripod, mic, and a high-quality sensor.

product.name: Samsung 1TB T7 SSD
product.description: Blazing-fast and ultra-portable – the Samsung T7 external SSD offers 1TB of reliable storage in a rugged, compact form.

product.name: Beats Studio Buds
product.description: Enjoy rich sound and ANC in a sleek design with Beats Studio Buds – true wireless earbuds for everyday listening.

product.name: Philips Hue Lightstrip Plus
product.description: Bring color to your space with Philips Hue Lightstrip Plus – flexible, voice-controlled LED lighting with smart features.
